channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is an interleaved feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: X’s First Transparency Report Since Elon Musk’s Takeover Is Finally Here
item.description: In the first half of 2024, the report says, X received nearly 67 million reports of hateful conduct, and took action on more than 2,000 accounts.

item.title: Reddit is bringing AI-powered, automatic translation to dozens of new countries
item.description: Reddit is bringing machine learning-powered translations to more than 35 new languages, including Brazilian Portuguese and Spanish. © 2024 TechCrunch....

item.title: Lexie B2 Plus Review: Good Value Hearing Aids
item.description: This Bose-powered hearing aid gets a (very) modest upgrade—including a case with a battery.

item.title: Automattic sends WP Engine its own cease-and-desist over WordPress trademark infringement
item.description: The brouhaha in the WordPress community looks likely to escalate into a legal battle around trademarks. © 2024 TechCrunch. All rights reserved. For pe...

item.title: Trae Stephens Has Built AI Weapons and Worked for Donald Trump. As He Sees It, Jesus Would Approve
item.description: He’s deep in the defense-startup world as a Founders Fund partner and Anduril cofounder. His bunker, though, isn’t fully prepped for the end times.

item.title: Vsim, founded by Nvidia alums, raises $24M for robotics simulation tech
item.description: Manchester-based Vsim is developing a new physics simulation framework, and has raised $21.5 million from EQT Ventures and a number of backers. © 2024...

item.title: Meta Connect 2024: How to Watch and What to Expect
item.description: Meta CEO Mark Zuckerberg will take the stage Wednesday morning to deliver a keynote address about all things AR and VR, chatbots, headsets, smart glas...

item.title: Airtel deploys AI to curb spam, calls for regulatory oversight on WhatsApp in India
item.description: Bharti Airtel is rolling out an AI-powered spam detection solution to all its customers to curb India's raging spam calls and messages problem. © 2024...

item.title: Google Is ‘Thinking Through’ How to Make the Pixel Watch Repairable
item.description: The current version of Google’s smartwatch isn’t repairable, but for the first time the company is figuring out how to fix that.

item.title: Hone Capital, a Silicon Valley firm, is being probed by the FBI
item.description: According to the FT, the FBI is now poking around nine-year-old Hone Capital, a Palo Alto, Ca.-based venture firm funded by a Chinese private equity f...
